attributes.action: Make Nigel Farrage  a knight of the realm.
attributes.background: Nigel spent 25 years campaigning for a vote to leave the Eu. and restore our sovereignty.   Without his tireless work David Cameron would never have given the British people the opportunity to make their voices heard.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour. 

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
